content: Salt Riverâ€¦Here, the Salt Gila Pumping Station east of Phoenix, part of what is now known as the Fannin-McFarland Aquaduct, is itself part of the CAP (Central Arizona Project) diverting Colorado River water into central and southern Arizona__no.0729, 2021.#Aquaduct #CAP #waterdiversion #ColoradoRiverwater
